name: css-column-span
description: Css module of single purpose classes for column span

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-column-span.css > css/css-column-span.css && tachyons src/css-column-span.css --minify > css/css-column-span.min.css && tachyons src/css-column-span.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
